title: Lithuania Foreign Direct Investment
description: Foreign Direct Investment in Lithuania increased by 709.85 EUR Million in the second quarter of 2022. Foreign Direct Investment in Lithuania averaged 284.34 EUR Million from 2004 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 2586.38 EUR Million in the second quarter of 2020 and a record low of -610.08 EUR Million in the first quarter of 2016. This page provides - Lithuania Foreign Direct Investment- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Bank of Lithuania
